subject: Organized Labor
Football
Lockouts
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The league responded to players’ attempt to gain an injunction to lift the lockout, including asking that the judge wait for a decision from the National Labor Relations Board.
snippet: The league responded to players’ attempt to gain an injunction to lift the lockout, including asking that the judge wait for a decision from the National Labor Relations Board.
